item.title: Apache Hop 2.6 is available!!
item.description: After a summer of hard work on 65 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.6.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.6 brings: Apache Beam Upgrade and doc updates New Google Transforms Google Analytics 4 Google Sheets Input and Output Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
